title: Keyboard Lag
body:
Hello, I've been suffering keyboard lag for brief periods during games, and it hasn't gone away even when I put in new batteries. I was wondering if there was anyway to fix this?

My keyboard is a Logitech Wireless Keyboard K350.

replies.body:
The first step is to determine what's causing the issue.  If you have another keyboard, try swapping it out.  This will help us determine if the issue is with teh hardware itself.  

You could also have a corrupt config folder causing problems as well, which a reset could fix:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if you have any questions!
I have the same problem recently, and I never had this problem before this January.
I've been having it last year, but recently it's been more frequent.

> [{quoted}](name=Mrs Susanoo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5oAY63OQ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-02-04T02:47:47.872+0000)
>
> I've been having it last year, but recently it's been more frequent.

Well, maybe because I started playing this game since last December XD
